value:
This is...a wedding gown? Every
thread...feels infused with joy.

The future is...uncertain. But one's
wishes and determination...can
change its course. I have seen it.

Fae and...Igrene... I am certain they
would be...quite surprised if they
saw me dressed like this.

It is true...the world is filled with
sorrow. But...people can create
just as much joy.
This dress...it is...fluttering. Hehe...

This festival...is being celebrated by
$Nf as well.

It flows in my veins...the blood of
a dragon.

The festival will end soon... I can
see it.
I know. I grow...slowly.
Blessings upon...you as well.

Hello...I am Sophia. May I also take
part...in the bridal festival?

I was wondering... What are...
festivals?$k$pPeople laugh together...feel at ease...
love one another. These are times of
great happiness?$k$pPeople have...so little time to live.
Even I...with half-dragon blood.
Eventually...we will all perish.$k$pPerhaps...that is why you pledge
eternity to someone...someone who
understands. A love that won't fade.$k$pI can see it. Such a short time. A
fleeting moment. And yet...those
feelings transcend all. And I...$k$pI wish for it too... An eternal love.
Someday...for someone to hold my
hand...as we walk to the horizon...
はっ…
たあっ…
きゃあっ…
いけない…
I...do.
You and I...
Together, forever...
My love…
Keep holding...my hand...
*Chuckle*
It seems that...today is the bridal festival...
Ah! Oh... Um...I think you have...the wrong person...?
This bridal dress... is so beautiful... so white, and so delicate...
In all my visions, I never saw that I would be a bride...
To pledge a vow of eternal love, how wonderful…
Perhaps… If I can find someone who accepts the dragon blood in my veins...
May bridal festival blessings...shower upon you too...
Yes...
Over here...?
Anywhere...
